#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    int t,x;
    cin>>t;
    for(x=1;x<=t;x++)
    {
                     char s[100000],s1;
                     int c,l;
                     cin>>s;
                     l=strlen(s);
                     c=0;
                     for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
                     c+=s[i];
                     c/=l;
                     s1=c;
                     cout<<s1<<endl;
                     }
                     }
